functions.title: Particularly relevant functions and features for your industry

main.description:
Since the Corona pandemic, the retail sector has also experienced appointment business. First came Click & Collect, then even Click & Meet. Without an appointment, a shopping experience was no longer possible. Many stores offered appointments right at the door. This was also due to the fact that the demand for appointment tools at times greatly exceeded the supply. Bookingflix was also literally overrun. This included many small stores as well as large chain stores, fashion chains and even DIY stores with almost 200 locations.
Those who could offer their customers an appointment tool during this time had a real competitive advantage. Because booking an appointment was also much more convenient, faster and easier for customers than standing in line on site to fill out a piece of paper with their own data.
And if the store was crowded at the time, the wait could easily be 30-60 minutes. With an appointment tool, the customer directly chose the free appointment slot and could be sure to get in immediately.
For the dealer Bookingflix also had some advantages. The time savings, especially with busy customer traffic, was significant. Also the capacity utilization could be controlled better. Because only free appointment slots could be booked. And in case of a necessary follow-up by the health department, all data was already available. Using the QR code check-in tools, customers could be booked in at the entrance to the second. Even a check-out, also via QR code scan, was possible without any problems.
After Click & Meet, the demand for appointment tools in retail has admittedly dropped significantly. But some stores have not cancelled their appointment tool. They now offer exclusive one-on-one advice (personal shopping) via it or customers can book repair services, for example. Even the collection of goods already purchased online continues to be handled via appointment tools. One sports store, for example, offers running shoe advice via Bookingflix. The customer books an appointment, and the retailer confirms the appointment. At the point-of-sale, the consultation and the sale then take place. In advance, the customer is reminded of the appointment several times by email and SMS. If necessary, or appointment can be canceled or rebooked by both sides with two clicks. These are digital services that customers simply expect and have become accustomed to. Not least because of the Corona pandemic.
main.title: Retail

sub.description:
Today, retailing is often more than strolling down the shopping street and spontaneous shopping on a whim. Customers expect, depending on their needs, extended, exclusive advice and after-sale services.
An example would be a bridal fashion store. Here, personal advice is an absolute must. Often, this consultation is scheduled with the customer in advance. After all, who wants to try on the same wedding dresses with five other customers, simultaneously, one after the other. The customer books the appointment and communicates in the booking process if necessary still special wishes or special needs. For example, the dress size and other accessories needed for the special day. Of course, the coordination and scheduling can also be done by phone. But an appointment tool is also a contact and marketing instrument. Because often the first contact takes place via it. The customer or the customer can then decide how and through what the first contact and appointment coordination takes place.
Via the appointment booking calendar, the customer sees the address of the store directly. Including a link to Google Maps. When booking, all possible appointments are displayed. The customer books thus, completely relaxed at home, the desired date for the purchase of the desire wedding dress.
By date reminder is reminded in advance again of the date. Optionally by email and SMS. The customer can send messages to the store via a chat tool. Or the sales consultant sends important information about the shopping appointment to the customer.
After the appointment, the customer receives, optionally, an after-sale email. For example with the request to rate the shopping appointment. For this Bookingflix is connected with the rating tool Hitklick.com. Customer reviews are very practical to constantly improve the own service. Moreover, they support the trust factor when new customers read the reviews of previous customers. This strengthens trust.
And if there are vacations, a company meeting or a public holiday, this can be set very easily in the dashboard of Bookingflix. A booking is then not possible on those days. Bookingflix also has a rights management. So individual appointment booking calendars can be managed by the responsible departments or employees:innen . They then only have access to the released, relevant appointment data. Different services can be created via the appointment booking calendar. Appointment duration, price, image and appointment name can be set individually. The customer then books the service that is desired.
